title: Welcome to SwimBuddz!
summary: We're excited to have you join our swimming community
body:
Welcome to SwimBuddz! Whether you're here to learn to swim, improve your technique, or join a community of passionate swimmers, we're glad to have you.

Here's how to get started:

1. **Complete your profile** - Add your swimming experience and goals
2. **Check the schedule** - View upcoming sessions and events
3. **Join a session** - Register for your first swim session
4. **Connect** - Meet other swimmers in our community

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to our team. Happy swimming! üèä

title: Pool Safety Guidelines
summary: Important safety rules for all swimmers
body:
Safety is our top priority at SwimBuddz. Please review these important guidelines:

**Before entering the pool:**
- Shower before swimming
- Check the pool depth markers
- Inform coaches of any health conditions

**While swimming:**
- Always follow coach instructions
- No running on the pool deck
- No diving in shallow areas
- Stay within your designated lane

**Emergency procedures:**
- Listen for whistle signals
- Know where lifeguards are positioned
- Report any concerns immediately

Thank you for helping us maintain a safe environment for everyone!

title: Club Membership Benefits
summary: Discover the advantages of club membership
body:
Are you ready to take your swimming to the next level? Club membership offers:

**Training Benefits:**
- Structured training programs
- Access to professional coaches
- Performance tracking and feedback
- Priority booking for popular sessions

**Community Benefits:**
- Exclusive club events
- Competition opportunities
- Connect with serious swimmers
- Member-only discounts

Interested? Contact us to learn more about upgrading to club membership!

title: Academy Programs Now Open
summary: Enroll in our structured swimming programs
body:
We're excited to announce that our Academy programs are now accepting enrollment!

**Available Programs:**
- Beginner Freestyle (12 weeks)
- Intermediate Strokes (10 weeks)
- Advanced Techniques (8 weeks)

**What's included:**
- Structured curriculum with clear milestones
- Small group instruction
- Progress assessments
- Completion certificate

Spaces are limited - enroll today to secure your spot!

title: Ride Share Available
summary: Need a ride to the pool? Join our ride-share community
body:
Getting to the pool just got easier! Our ride-share feature helps members coordinate transportation.

**How it works:**
1. Check if ride-share is enabled for your session
2. Request a ride or offer seats in your vehicle
3. Connect with other members going your way
4. Share the journey and the cost

This is a community-driven initiative to make swimming more accessible. Check the session details to see ride-share options!
